p: Finally, there is an option that may become increasingly attractive to some countries, which could be called the “liberalization of personal risk management”. If the unfortunate situation of the pandemic prolongs and no drugs or vaccines become available anytime soon, some countries may begin to consider granting the right to its citizens to become infected with coronavirus if they so wish. It would mean letting the adult citizens personally assess the acceptable risk for themselves, as well as for all the people they care for, and then adjust their behavior accordingly to that accepted risk.
